Text:
hello prathaprabhu,
you seem to have a full access to technet downloads, could you upload french windows isos? i'm looking for fr_windows_7_ultimate_n_x64_dvd_x16-13647.iso ,it would be nice.
can somebody white how to do when i have downloaded it?

Hi.

What does VL (volume license) mean ? it can be installed on more than pne pc's ?
I've seen you also posted the non VL version......which one should I install ?

10x
There are no official checksums for these versions so you have no way of knowing if these are untouched.

volume license is a corporate thing. MS does it so that companies don't have to keep track of hundreds if not thousands of individual licenses on their computers. 

the official hashes are listed on Microsoft's website https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/subscriptions/securedownloads/default.aspx if you view the details on a given image it contains hashes.
